-- VHDL Configuration
-- Concurrent Signal Assignment: Select
-- By: Marcelo

-- Concurrent Signal Assgnments are done outside of process blocks

-- Generic Syntax
with SIGNAL_SELECT select
	SIGNAL_TARGET <= VALUE1 when SIGNAL_SELECT_VALUE1,
			      <= VALUE2 when SIGNAL_SELECT_VALUE2;


-- Specific example usage of select, used in 4:1 multiplexer module
with SELECTION select
	MUX_OUT <= D3 when "11",
		       D2 when "10",
		       D1 when "01",
		       D0 when "00",
		       '0' when others;
